channel.title: Help
channel.description: ok im making a server and i dont get when people say"put this in client java" i dont get where to put it in cuz obviously if i put it in the wrong place i get errors. i was trying to put ancients in and the guy says put it in case 131: ok so i go looking and find it i put after the : and i get errors? i dont know what it means to put it IN a case so please give me an answer :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @allserversuck allserversuck
item.description:
@allserversuck wrote:

ok so i get it so not case 131:script its under ok i get it

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

you put it after : so
yours looks something like

case 131: script lines script lines script lines case 132:

or something like that if so you may want to try adding “break;” at the end of it.

case 131: script lines script lines script lines break; case 132:
also check to see if there is not already another case 131, if you still have a problem then screen shot the error message and where you put the code and ill help out.

Read full topic
